full_text:
Always taking time out of his day to just appreciate folks, and inject positivity into a social media world that is 99.9% hateful and negative on the regular.

Appreciate you @boliver36, need more people like you my man!
Weird way to spell Steelers but ok https://t.co/nGqQ062oCH
It’s a ‘From Autumn to Ashes’ kind of afternoon.
